full_summary:
### Management Control Framework: A Tender Announcement

#### Issued By: Indigenous Services Canada

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01003668

**Solicitation Number:** 1000244427

**Date of Publication:** August 8, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** August 22, 2022, at 14:00:00

**Tender Status:** Expired

### Description of Requirement

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking a Business consultant and Financial specialist to provide subject matter expertise in the development of a Management Control Framework (MCF) specifically to enable the success of the initiatives and programs in the Child and Family Services sector.

The framework will be developed to ensure effective management and control of child welfare programs and services in Indigenous communities.

### Task Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement

ISC is seeking a qualified Supplier under the TSPS Method of Supply, Tier 1, for the following services:

* Business Service (Category 2.3) - Business Consultant, one (1) Senior Level
* Project Management Services (Category 3.8) - Financial Specialist, one (1) Senior Level

### Proposal Requirements

To be considered, the Supplier must:

* Hold a Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS
* Be qualified in Tier 1 for the specified categories
* Provide a detailed proposal outlining the scope of work, methodology, and timelines for the management control framework development
* Meet the Common security requirement checklist #10

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* WTO-AGP
* CPTPP
* CETA
* CFTA
* CCFTA
* CCOFTA
* CHFTA
* CKFTA
* CPAFTA
* CPFTA
* CUFTA

### Contract Details

* Proposed period of contract: Contract award date to March 31, 2023
* Estimated level of effort: 75 days for each resource

### Contact Information

Elly Ha, Contracting Authority

Phone: 819-997-0464
Email: ellyhyeonkyeong.ha@canada.ca
